item.title: Stage
item.description: An Integrated Life-Course Approach for Person-Centred Solutions and Care for Ageing with Multi-morbidity in the European Regions.

item.title: Obelisk
item.description: To deliver scientific breakthroughs to enhance our understanding of the molecular mechanisms by which causative factors interact to drive (or prevent) the transition from normal weight to obesity during childhood.

item.title: Longitools
item.description: To perform econometric analysis of NCD burden due to external exposome, within a life-course approach
